file_content.text: Get away from me! I don't ever want to see you again!
Thank you! Thank you so much!
You're back! Did you rescue them? Are my loved ones finally safe?
Here you go--not a scratch on them.
Yes, they're all safe.
Thank you! Thank you so much!
Raith, you... you can't be serious. This is a joke, right? Right? Raith?
Thank you... thank you....
I don't even know what to say. I'm sorry you had to waste your time with this. Uh, have a good one, friend. Take care.
You want your precious "loved ones"? There! There they are!
You idiot! [Smash loved ones]
Ahh! No! Why would you do that? Why, why?
Raith, I don't... toys? This was all about toys? That's what the pirates took from you?
Shut up! Just shut up! Maybe I can still fix them....
Please! They mean everything to me. Don't let those pirates hurt them!
I don't know what to do, Tonn... they have me.
But you're a hero, Raith! The supplies you've snuck back to us are the only reason we've lasted this long--don't give up now!
It's over, Tonn. I can't even protect the ones I love. I'm just a glorified thief, not a hero.
Look there--a Jedi. A Jedi would never let their loved ones get kidnapped by a pack of brutal pirates. That's a real hero for you. Not like me.
Strictly speaking, a Jedi doesn't have loved ones.
We try to avoid attachments.
Well, I do. And they're as good as done for.
Look there. A soldier--a real hero. If a bloodthirsty pirate gang kidnapped a soldier's loved ones, they'd never get away with it. Me? I'm lost.
Justice isn't limited to soldiers.
That isn't true.
No, just to people who actually know how to fight.
Look there. Someone like that would never let their loved ones fall into the hands of vicious pirates! Not like me.
Are you saying there are people in danger?
What's happened here?
Yes. And there's nothing I can do for them. Nothing at all....
Despair may blind us to the path, but that doesn't mean there isn't one.
There is always a way.
I'm just a thief! I don't know the first thing about fighting pirates.
Give me the situation, sir. What's this all about?
There's been a kidnapping?
Revenge. The pirates want to make me suffer.
Pirates, huh? I can sympathize.
I know how you feel.
I don't understand.
A gang of pirates has taken the ones I love most. They want to make me suffer for crossing them.
I'm really not interested in being dragged into your problems.
Leave me out of it.
You don't understand. Raith's been helping the people of Tatooine for years, someone has to help him!
Pirates think that just because Tatooine is off the beaten path, they can do whatever they want here.
They murder, steal, burn... Raith was the first one to stand up to them!
I merely returned what had been stolen. And when the scumbags realized they'd never catch me, they took my loved ones instead.
I've no means to pay the ransom, and a rescue mission would be suicidal. Some hero I've turned out to be.
I'll bring back your loved ones. It's my duty as a Jedi.
Let me handle this.
You've helped so many; now let someone do something for you.
Let me help you.
Armed pirates, multiple hostages... pretty standard op for me.
I can handle this.
I could deal with these pirates for you. I have had practice.
Need a hand?
Oh, perfect! If you help Raith, we'll never be able to thank you enough!
I could deal with this problem, if I had the right... incentive.
Would I get paid if I helped?
To help Raith? Of course! I'll take up a collection to make sure your work is rewarded.
I... I don't know what to say. Thank you. Just please, make sure they don't come to harm.
And make those scumbags pay!
Not my problem. [Refuse quest]
Yeah, great. Thanks for nothing.
They're as good as gone....
Please, I... not now.
